makibishi.desc: Scatters caltrops on the ground that damage sushi.

magnet.desc: Creates a magnetic field that slows down sushi.

bomb.desc: Throws a homing bomb that explodes after a short time.

kunai.desc: Throws a volley of kunai in a wide area.

katana.desc: A draggable, powerful blade that continuously damages sushi.

sushibro.desc: Summons a friendly sushi that attacks sushi from the goal.

sprinkler.desc: Creates a mist that continuously damages sushi within its range.

bookshelf.desc: Launches a book that circles the tower, damaging sushi.

mousetrap.desc: A draggable trap that temporarily stops sushi.

airhockey.desc: An interactive tower where you hit a puck to damage sushi.

flashlight.desc: Shoots a laser beam across the screen.

obake.desc: A ghost that circles you and shoots projectiles.

slime.desc: A slime that follows you and shoots projectiles.

landmine.desc: Draggable mines that explode on contact.

pole.desc: A draggable chain of poles that damage sushi on contact.

boomerang.desc: Throws a boomerang that circles outwards from you.

thimble.desc: Reduces the cost of {guu}'s cards by 1.

sponge.desc: Reduces the cost of all cards by 1.

sharpener.desc: Reduces 1 deck size and adds 1 projectile count.

yarnball.desc: Gain an additional acquisition at the start of each round.

gas.desc: Gain 1 additional acquisition at the start of each round for chosen cards.

eyeshadow.desc: Gain 1 additional acquisition at the start of each round for chosen cards.

handkerchief.desc: Gain 1 additional acquisition at the start of each round for {guu}'s cards.

desc: Levels up a card in your deck.

toothpaste.desc: Doubles {boss} speed and triples {exp} gained from {boss}.

pen.desc: Reduces the cost of chosen cards by 1.

keyboard.desc: An interactive keyboard that shoots projectiles when keys are pressed.

simple-16.desc: A 16-step sequencer that plays notes and shoots projectiles.

desc: {ghost} cards will no longer be consumed

sunglasses.desc: Sunglasses that can be moved around to shoot projectiles.

swingingblade.desc: A blade that swings back and forth, damaging sushi.

roulette.desc: A roulette that shoots projectiles in various patterns.

sunglasseswitheyes.desc: Adds eyes to the sunglasses, allowing them to shoot projectiles automatically.

practiceofkunai.desc: Kunai will now home in on sushi.

longfusebomb.desc: Increases the fuse time of the bomb, allowing it to travel further.

makibishimakibishi.desc: Makibishi will now scatter more caltrops.

neodymiummagnet.desc: Increases the strength of the magnet, slowing sushi more.

sushiparty.desc: Adds more sushi to the sushibro's party.

guidedsprinkler.desc: The sprinkler's mist will now home in on sushi.

bookflower.desc: The bookshelf's book will now travel in a flower pattern.

poisonbottle.desc: Throws a bottle that creates a poison cloud on impact.

mouseghost.desc: A ghost will now appear when the mousetrap is triggered.

bigface.desc: Makes the face tower much larger and shoot more projectiles.

burstmode.desc: The rifle will now fire in a 3-shot burst.

premiumpuck.desc: The air hockey puck will now slide much further.

mirrorball.desc: Turns the flashlight into a mirrorball that damages sushi in a wide area.

nurikabe.desc: The obake will now summon a wall to block sushi.

queenslime.desc: The slime will now periodically spawn more slimes.

antiairfighter.desc: An anti-air fighter will now fly across the screen when the anti-air tower fires.

claymore.desc: Turns landmines into powerful claymores that shoot projectiles.

constructionsite.desc: Doubles the length of the pole.

integratedresort.desc: The merlion will now spout a resort facility.

bombboomerang.desc: The boomerang will now explode on contact.

looper.desc: Adds a looper to the keyboard, allowing you to record and play back melodies.

extensionbar.desc: Expands the simple-16 to a simple-32.

circulatingcurrent.desc: The telephone pole will now shoot lightning from all poles simultaneously.

fullswingingblade.desc: The swinging blade will now swing in a full circle at high speed.

jackpot.desc: Adds a jackpot to the roulette, with a chance to release a powerful attack.

triplepoisonampoule.desc: Triples the duration of the poison cloud.

handspinner.desc: A spinner that damages sushi on contact. Click to spin it.

electrichandspinner.desc: The handspinner will now spin automatically.

tabletennis.desc: A table tennis racket that you can use to hit a ball at sushi.

tabletennis2.desc: Hitting the ball with the racket will now create more balls.

sasumata.desc: A draggable pole arm that can stop sushi.

spikesasumata.desc: The sasumata will now release spikes when it hits sushi.

samepuzzle.desc: A puzzle game where matching gems shoots projectiles.

easymode.desc: Reduces the number of gem types in the samepuzzle.

capsuletoymachine.desc: A machine that launches capsule toys at sushi.

capsuletoybadge.desc: Captured sushi will now become projectiles.

clock.desc: A clock that damages sushi around it.

x3clock.desc: Makes the clock tower 3 times larger.

artillery.desc: An artillery cannon that fires a long-range projectile.

longartillery.desc: Greatly increases the range of the artillery.

thundercloud.desc: A cloud that strikes sushi with lightning.

lightningrod.desc: Adds lightning rods that will also be struck by lightning.

signpole.desc: A sign pole that shoots projectiles upwards.

scissorsstorm.desc: The sign pole will now also shoot scissors.

ufocatcher.desc: A UFO catcher that can grab and defeat sushi.

homingufocatcher.desc: The UFO catcher will now home in on sushi.

pencil.desc: Draw lines on the screen to damage sushi.

eraser.desc: Adds an eraser that can be used to home in on sushi.

storepage.desc: A store page that launches megaphones at sushi.

discountsale.desc: The store page will now launch homing megaphones.

magiccarpet.desc: A magic carpet that follows you and shoots projectiles.

jinn.desc: The magic carpet will now summon a jinn.

stealth.desc: Allows you to become temporarily invisible and throw random items.

throwingwildly.desc: The stealth power will now throw 5 items at once.

bambooshootlance.desc: Summons a bamboo shoot from the ground to attack sushi.

longbambooshootlance.desc: Makes the bamboo shoot lance much longer.

cat.desc: A cat that runs across the screen, damaging sushi.

sittingcat.desc: A sitting cat will now appear, damaging ground sushi.

dog.desc: A dog that you can move to attack sushi.

frisbee.desc: The dog will now play frisbee with you, damaging sushi in between.

transparentdonut.desc: A donut that attacks flying sushi.

realization.desc: The transparent donut will now become solid, allowing it to hit all sushi.

thinking.desc: A thought bubble that follows you and can generate projectiles.

imagination.desc: The thinking bubble will now periodically shoot projectiles.

paperclip.desc: Increases all acquisition value every 10 seconds.

tonfa.desc: A draggable tonfa that damages sushi. Flips on hit.

tonfabeam.desc: The tonfa will now shoot a beam when it flips.

bamboocopter.desc: A bamboo copter that attacks flying sushi.

paperballoon.desc: The bamboocopter will now also launch a paper balloon.

eyes.desc: A pair of eyes that shoot lasers where you point.

kiss.desc: Adds a mouth to the eyes that can be moved around to damage sushi.

domino.desc: A set of dominoes that can be knocked over to create a chain reaction explosion.

pivot.desc: Adds a pivot to the dominoes, allowing for more complex chain reactions.

makibishigun.desc: Increases the fire rate of {ground} by 1.5x.

cursedkatana.desc: Doubles {katana}'s attack, but increases {enemy} speed by 1.5x.

bookwiththorns.desc: Increases the fire rate of {tower} by 1.2x.

heavybullets.desc: Doubles the attack of {tower}, but reduces their fire rate.

driedslime.desc: Increases the bullet speed of {tower} by 1.5x.

catching.desc: Increases the fire rate of {air} by 1.5x.

scissorcase.desc: Increases the fire rate of {both} by 1.5x.

monkey.desc: Doubles the fire rate of {tower}, but reduces their attack.

telescope.desc: Gain 1 projectile count, but lose 5 attack.

hamsterwheel.desc: A hamster in a wheel that damages sushi as it rolls.

sunflowerseeds.desc: The hamster will now run back and forth automatically.

motorpoweredwheel.desc: Increases the bullet speed of {ninja} by 1.5x.

desc: The next time you would gain a scroll, gain 2 scrolls instead.

elevatorsauce.desc: An elevator sauce that can move sushi between ground and air.

flyingsauce.desc: The elevator sauce will now have a flying saucer companion.

hatmissile.desc: The hat will now shoot a missile.

worldfixes.desc: Multiply your acquisition value by -2 at the start of each round.

electrictoothbrush.desc: Permanently keep more 10% of any temporary status.

teleporter.desc: A teleporter that can move sushi to a random point on the path.

report.desc: Gain experience when sushi is teleported.

rafflesia.desc: A flower that blooms and then shoots projectiles.

poisonflower.desc: The rafflesia will now also create a poison cloud.

button.desc: A button that fires a laser across the screen when pressed.

moneyslot.desc: Adds a money slot to the button, allowing you to press it again for a cost.

flaminghoop.desc: A flaming hoop that sets projectiles on fire, giving them an area of effect.

eternalflame.desc: The flaming hoop will now last forever.

stonecarving.desc: A stone carving that can be interacted with to gain stats.

moneysolution.desc: The stone carving will now accept coins instead of health.

tackle.desc: A tackle that damages sushi around you.

jump.desc: The tackle will now be able to jump, hitting air sushi.

soapbubbles.desc: Creates floating soap bubbles that damage sushi in the air.

soapbubbleaccelerator.desc: Accelerates the bubble, increasing its speed and damage.

hawk.desc: The hawk circles overhead and attacks the sushi in the air.

hawkclawflash.desc: Hawk performs a powerful hawk claw flash attack.

helicopter.desc: A controllable helicopter that follows your cursor.

helicopterblowgun.desc: The helicopter is now equipped with a blowgun that automatically fires projectiles.

meatpullups.desc: Click to do pull-ups, firing a projectile when the meat reaches the top.

meatmeter.desc: A meter is added for automatic pull-ups. The closer the meter is to full, the faster the pull-ups will be.

synchronizedsalmon.desc: A team of synchronized salmon jump from the ground, damaging sushi.

whale.desc: A powerful whale appears with the salmon, damaging all sushi in a wide area.

pandagraph.desc: Draws a line graph and damages sushi.

columnchart.desc: Changes the pandagraph into a column chart that damages sushi.

motherhanpen.desc: The hanpen printer will now print a giant mother hanpen.
